domainCrystal.spawn: A mysterious domain crystal has appeared on this floor...!

domainEffect.enter: Entered the influence of domain effect "{label}"!

domain.poisonNegated: The domain effect nullified the poison damage!
domain.poisonReversed: The poison's pain reversed and restored {amount} HP!
domain.rareChestGuarded: The golden chest exploded, but the domain effect protected you!
domain.rareChestReversed: The golden chest explosion reversed and restored {amount} HP!
domain.rareChestDamage: The golden chest exploded! HP decreased by {damage} (timing off by {timing}%).
domain.rareChestDeath: Caught in the golden chest explosion... Game over.
domain.damageBlocked: The domain effect prevented you from dealing damage...
domain.enemyHealed: The domain effect healed the enemy for {amount}!
domain.poisonFloorNegated: The domain effect nullified the poison floor's damage!
domain.poisonFloorReversed: The poison floor's energy reversed and restored {amount} HP!
domain.poisonFloorDamage: The poison floor dealt damage! HP decreased by {amount}.
domain.poisonFloorDeath: The poison floor defeated you... Game over.
domain.bombGuarded: The domain effect blocked the blast!
domain.bombReversed: The blast's force reversed and restored {amount} HP!
domain.bombDamage: The bomb exploded! HP decreased by {amount}.
domain.bombDeath: Caught in the bomb blast... Game over.
domain.bombSafe: The bomb exploded but you took no damage!
domain.enemyAttackGuarded: The domain effect protected you from damage!
domain.enemyAttackReversed: The domain effect turned the enemy attack into healing! Restored {amount} HP.

nested.label: NESTED Dimension
nested.title: NESTED dimension: recommended level increases by 2600*(N-1)

card.title: Synthesis Preview
card.note: Identical selections produce identical generation (fixed seed).
card.randomTargetTitle: Ignore base dimension level; only sum the three block levels.
card.weightedRandomTitle: Random selection weighted by target level and type priority

test.title: Dungeon Test
test.description: Generates every registered dungeon type with random seeds to verify BlockDim is safe. Errors are logged and the run never finishes if an infinite loop occurs.

miniexp.placeholder: Select a mini-game from the list on the left.
